column5: Last fall I fished Lac Seul with some friends. We stayed in Sioux Lookout at the Lamplighter motel one night. Walking down a hallway in the hotel there was a really nice map of that area of Lac Seul mounted on the wall. Does anyone who knows of this map know where a person could purchase a copy? Pooch
Not sure which map it is but the sports store in Sioux Lookout sells lake maps as did the gas station at the Hudson turnoff.
There is a full Lac Seul map and there are section maps also available:http://www.trakmaps.com/regions.php?region=ontario_i_05
